AI_Prompt_Template: Generate a technology competition crisis where {Faction_A} develops {Technology_Type} causing {Faction_B} to respond with {Response_Type}. Include international implications and player choice consequences.
Example_Generated_Event: China develops quantum LSW enhancement causing US to impose technology sanctions and threaten military action. European Union forced to choose sides while India offers mediation.
Player_Impact: Players must choose between escalation and cooperation; Technology access affected; International operations complicated
Dramatic_Potential: High - Technology arms race with military implications
Realism_Level: High - Based on real technology competition

AI_Prompt_Template: Create a border incident where {Country_A} LSWs cross into {Country_B} territory causing {Incident_Type}. Show how {Faction_C} and {Faction_D} respond differently.
Example_Generated_Event: Pakistani LSWs cross Kashmir border pursuing terrorists causing Indian military response. US supports India while China backs Pakistan creating proxy conflict.
Player_Impact: Border operations become restricted; Faction authority affected; Investigation cooperation limited
Dramatic_Potential: Very High - Military escalation with superpower backing
Realism_Level: High - Based on real geopolitical tensions

AI_Prompt_Template: Generate a crisis where valuable {Resource_Type} is discovered in {Location} causing international competition between {Faction_List}.
Example_Generated_Event: Alien technology deposits discovered in Congo triggering international competition. Nigeria claims African sovereignty while US/China/India seek resource access.
Player_Impact: Resource access affects technology development; African operations authority; Continental vs international law
Dramatic_Potential: High - International resource competition
Realism_Level: Medium - Fictional alien resources but realistic competition
